e: ￹`Ma~`samolal~ `ko~ `'ongcoy~ `no~ `riyar~.￺The rocks in the ocean can be seen (because the tide is out).￻海裡的岩石因退潮而顯露出來了
￹`Ma~`samolal~ `to~ `ko~ `folad~ `anini~.￺The moon is starting to show a little sliver.￻月亮今天漸漸開始顯出細長條狀的形狀
￹`Ma~`samolal~ `to~ `ko~ `ni~`paloma~`an~ `ako~ `a~ `dateng~.￺The vegetables I planted are starting to show.￻我播種的蔬菜已發芽了
d.f: ￹￺to turn up * to become evident￻出現，顯現，掘起，仰上
